mapper.sql: user_id, dept_id, realname, identity_type, salt, avatar, id_card_no, used_name, gender, nation, registeredresidence, ancestor_place, born_place, health, familyorigin, birthday , marital_status, unit_id, unit_name, work_date, phone, fix_phone, education, degree, family_address, community_addr, profession, positive, democratic_party, technician, migrant, graduated_from, contact, joinelsetime, police_office, retired_time, post_time, portrait, person_identity, stratum, front_line, qq_number, email, wx_openid, qq_openid, pm_code, join_time, regular_time, regular_status, develop_type, reference, fee_ratio, join_after_august, is_poor, is_llost, flow_status, flow_from_org_id, flow_from_org_name, flow_from_org_contactor, flow_from_org_phone, flow_to_org_id, flow_to_org_name, flow_to_org_contactor, flow_to_org_phone, policy_face, positived, join_contact_id, contactor, app_date, exp_activist_date, activist_date, exp_dev_date, dev_date, dev_stage, ebl_flag, del_flag, order_num, description, create_time, create_userid, create_username, update_time, update_userid, update_username, version ,files_manage_unit_id,join_org_id,join_org_name, join_org_type,join_org_contactor,join_org_phone,is_self_dev,registry_status,files_manage_unit,is_taiwaner,job_position, report_org_id,report_org_name,report_org_contactor,report_org_phone,join_org_time
post_reason, work_resumes, comment, content, rewards, present_perform

u.user_id,realname,gender,TIMESTAMPDIFF(YEAR, birthday, CURDATE()) AS age,nation,id_card_no,join_time,join_org_time,regular_time,report_org_name,phone,identity_type,marital_status, education,flow_status,IFNULL(is_llost,'0') as is_llost,IFNULL(is_poor,'0') as is_poor,IFNULL(is_taiwaner,'0') as is_taiwaner,u.dept_id,birthday,migrant,stratum,front_line,work_date,ancestor_place,registry_status,family_address,u.community_addr, job_position,u.health,u.avatar,u.fix_phone,u.positived,u.files_manage_unit,u.work_resumes,u.stratum,u.profession
fd.`NAME` AS in_where_dept_name, sd.`NAME` AS subordinate_dept_name
mapper.select: select user_id,dept_id,realname,gender,nation,phone,fix_phone,birthday, join_org_name,marital_status,ancestor_place,join_org_time from sys_user where user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT} and ebl_flag = '1' and del_flag = '0'

select
,
from sys_user where user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT} and ebl_flag = '1' and del_flag = '0'

select d.name as org_name, d.community_addr as org_addr_name, u.files_manage_unit, t.administrative_division_name as community_addr_name,
from sys_user u left join sys_dept d on d.dept_id=u.dept_id left join tab_pb_administrative_division t on t.administrative_division_id = u.community_addr where u.user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

select
,tt.unit_property,
from sys_user u inner join ( select u.user_id
from (select dept_id as org_id from sys_dept dept where dept.del_flag = '0' and dept.ebl_flag = '1'
and (dept.dept_id = #{deptId} or dept.parent_id = #{deptId})
and find_in_set(#{deptId}, dept.full_path)
) d inner join sys_user u on u.dept_id = d.org_id
from sys_user u
order by realname limit #{index}, #{limit} ) t on t.user_id = u.user_id LEFT JOIN sys_dept fd ON fd.dept_id = u.flow_to_org_id LEFT JOIN sys_dept sd ON sd.dept_id = u.dept_id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT ui.unit_property, dd.dept_id FROM sys_dept dd INNER JOIN tab_pb_unit_info ui ON dd.unit_id = ui.unit_id WHERE dd.del_flag = '0' AND dd.ebl_flag = '1' AND ui.del_flag = '0' ) tt ON tt.dept_id = u.dept_id ORDER BY realname

SELECT count( u.user_id )
from (select dept_id as org_id from sys_dept dept where dept.del_flag = '0' and dept.ebl_flag = '1'
and (dept.dept_id = #{deptId} or dept.parent_id = #{deptId})
and find_in_set(#{deptId}, dept.full_path)
) d inner join sys_user u on u.dept_id = d.org_id
from sys_user u

mapper.select: select user_id from sys_user where id_card_no =#{idCardNo}
select * from sys_user where id_card_no =#{idCardNo} and del_flag = '0' limit 1
select identity_type from sys_user where user_id =#{user_id} and ebl_flag = '0' and del_flag ='0'

select
from sys_user where del_flag = '0' and ebl_flag = '1'
AND realname like concat(concat("%",#{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}),"%")
AND id_card_no = #{idCardNo}

select users.manage_dept_id , dept.name as dept_name , users.user_id,users.username,users.phone from sys_user users inner join sys_user_role ur on users.user_id = ur.user_id INNER JOIN sys_role srl on srl.role_id = ur.role_id and srl.role_code='ROLE_DWGZZ' INNER JOIN sys_dept dept on users.manage_dept_id = dept.dept_id where users.manage_dept_id =#{deptId}

select users.manage_dept_id , dept.name as dept_name , users.user_id,users.username,users.phone from sys_user users inner join sys_user_role ur on users.user_id = ur.user_id INNER JOIN sys_role srl on srl.role_id = ur.role_id and srl.role_code='ROLE_DWGZZ' INNER JOIN sys_dept dept on users.manage_dept_id = dept.dept_id where users.manage_dept_id in
#{manageDeptId}
mapper.update: update sys_user set dept_id=#{deptId} where user_id=#{userId}
mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT users.user_id, users.username, d.dept_id, d.NAME, p.positive_name FROM sys_user users LEFT JOIN ( SELECT DISTINCT p.user_id, p.positive_name, p.org_id, di.label FROM ( SELECT user_id, positive_name, positive_org_id AS org_id FROM tab_pb_positives WHERE del_flag = '0'UNION ALL SELECT user_id, positive_id, org_id FROM tab_pb_lead_team_member WHERE del_flag = '0' ) AS p LEFT JOIN sys_dict AS di ON p.positive_name = di.id AND di.del_flag = '0' ) AS p ON users.user_id = p.user_id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT d.dept_id, d.NAME FROM sys_dept AS d WHERE d.del_flag = '0' ) d ON d.dept_id = users.dept_id WHERE users.user_id = #{userId} AND users.del_flag = '0' AND p.label IS NOT NULL

SELECT l.link_ledaer_id, users.user_id, users.username, d.dept_id, d.NAME FROM sys_user users INNER JOIN tab_pb_link_leader l on users.user_id = l.user_id INNER JOIN sys_dept d ON d.dept_id = users.dept_id WHERE l.dept_id = #{deptId} AND users.del_flag = '0' AND d.del_flag = '0' AND l.del_flag = '0'
select IFNULL(s.likes,'0') from sys_user s where user_id = #{userId}
select user_id, gender, id_card_no, dept_id AS org_id,realname as username from sys_user where del_flag = '0' and dept_id = #{deptId}
SELECT COUNT(1) FROM sys_dept WHERE dept_id = #{orgId} AND FIND_IN_SET(#{orgId},(SELECT full_path FROM sys_dept WHERE dept_id = #{deptId} and del_flag = '0'))
SELECT COUNT(1) FROM sys_user WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND del_flag = '0' and ebl_flag='1'
SELECT COUNT(1) FROM sys_user WHERE id_card_no = #{idCard} AND del_flag = '0'
SELECT COUNT(1) FROM sys_user WHERE phone = #{phone} AND del_flag = '0'

SELECT u.user_id, u.realname, u.id_card_no, u.gender, u.birthday, birthday2age ( DATE_FORMAT( birthday, '%Y-%m-%d' ) ) AS age, u.community_addr, u.phone, u.identity_type, d.dept_id AS org_id, d.`name` AS org_name FROM sys_user u inner join ( select u.user_id
from (select dept_id as org_id from sys_dept dept where dept.del_flag = '0' and dept.ebl_flag = '1'
and (dept.dept_id = #{orgId} or dept.parent_id = #{orgId})
and find_in_set(#{orgId}, dept.full_path)
) d inner join sys_user u on u.dept_id = d.org_id
from sys_user u
order by realname limit #{index}, #{limit} ) t on t.user_id = u.user_id INNER JOIN sys_dept d ON d.dept_id = u.dept_id AND d.del_flag = '0' AND d.ebl_flag = '1' ORDER BY u.realname

SELECT count( u.user_id )
from (select dept_id as org_id from sys_dept dept where dept.del_flag = '0' and dept.ebl_flag = '1'
and (dept.dept_id = #{orgId} or dept.parent_id = #{orgId})
and find_in_set(#{orgId}, dept.full_path)
) d inner join sys_user u on u.dept_id = d.org_id
from sys_user u

SELECT u.user_id, u.realname, u.id_card_no, u.gender, u.birthday, birthday2age ( DATE_FORMAT( birthday, '%Y-%m-%d' ) ) AS age, u.community_addr, u.phone, u.identity_type, d.dept_id AS org_id, u.avatar, d.`name` AS org_name FROM sys_user u INNER JOIN sys_dept d ON d.dept_id = u.dept_id WHERE u.del_flag = '0' AND u.ebl_flag = '1' AND u.id_card_no = #{idCardNo}
mapper.update: update sys_user set is_poor = #{isPoor} where user_Id = (select user_Id from tab_pb_hardship where hardship_id = #{hardshipId})
